Reviews.Title: great company !
Reviews.Author: Jerri Carey
Reviews.Content: Has been a great phone. No problemsFits in my big hands perfect, screen size good, first smart phone wow. No more flip

Reviews.Title: same feautures as the galaxys
Reviews.Author: jeffrey hoffman jr
Reviews.Content: has the same features as the more pricey galaxy's but perfect for the right amount of money. I recommend giving it a try cant go wrong

Reviews.Title: Great for its price.
Reviews.Author: Will I Am
Reviews.Content: At this price, this device is good enough for your modern day uses. I am glad I bought this device!

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Donna Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone when it first came out and it was a really nice phone but it was stolen from me and I repurchased it here on amazon and I was not really impressed.  This does not seem to be the same phone.  This seems like a cheaper version.  The charger fell apart the first night and even if the ringer is loud, I still miss calls.  Sucks!

Reviews.Title: Best 3 year old phone available!
Reviews.Author: Emmett Ross
Reviews.Content: I've had a galaxy nexus for almost a year now and i can say with certainty that i will never have another brand ever. Google rocks my socks. i just wish the google version of Siri was a little...sexier.

Reviews.Title: False description
Reviews.Author: Ranjan Patel
Reviews.Content: The seller says it a no contract phone but it does not work with Verizon.  I only found out when I took it to the dealer and it's It's only good for TMobile.  False description.

ProductInfo.Features:
This device is 100% functional and in overall semi-new condition. Only a few minor blemishes; almost undetectable.
Screen Protector
Extra Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Nexus SCH-I515 - 16GB - Metallic silver (Verizon) Smartphone
